hero.subtitle: Expert permanent makeup and certified personal training‚Äîcrafted for those who value both artistry and wellness.

about.title:
About
Mariia
about.intro: Hello! I'm Mariia, specializing in permanent makeup and eyebrow styling. As a multi-passionate entrepreneur, I combine artistry and wellness to help you look and feel your best.
about.studio: Operating from my studio in Warsaw's ≈ör√≥dmie≈õcie since July 2023, I've built a community of over 56,000 followers who trust me for their beauty and fitness journey.
about.mission: As a Zdrofit-certified trainer and BM Beauty Studio owner, I'm dedicated to helping clients rediscover movement and beauty without pressure or comparisons.

beautySection.title:
Beauty
Studio
beautySection.description: Award-winning permanent makeup in Warsaw. Soft, natural, long-lasting results that enhance your unique beauty.

lips.subtitle: Permanent Makeup
lips.description: Perfectly defined, natural-looking lips. Healed-first approach ensures soft, lasting results.

brows.title: Brows
brows.subtitle: Permanent Makeup
brows.description: Wake up with perfect brows every day. Custom shape and color matched to you.

eyeliner.title: Eyeliner
eyeliner.subtitle: Permanent Makeup
eyeliner.description: Precise, smudge-proof definition. Subtle enhancement or bold statement.

styling.description: Professional shaping, tinting, and lamination for daily confidence.

Personal
Training
fitnessSection.description: Zdrofit certified trainer helping you rediscover movement. Strong habits built at your pace, without comparisons or pressure.

personal.title: Personal Training
personal.description: Customized sessions at Zdrofit focused on your unique goals. No pressure, just progress at your own pace.

holistic.title: Holistic Wellness
holistic.description: Movement, mindset, and sustainable lifestyle changes. A judgment-free approach to reconnecting with your body.

strength.title: Strength & Mobility
strength.description: Build functional strength and improve range of motion. Training that supports your daily life and long-term health.
